systemDesign.title: System Design
systemDesign.description: Our engineers create a customized plan that meets your specific requirements and budget.

heroSection.title: Smart Home for Your Comfort
heroSection.subtitle: Control your home from anywhere. Convenient and safe.
heroSection.returningUserMessage: We're glad to see you again! Continue managing your smart home in your personal dashboard.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2020, SmartHouse has been at the forefront of home automation technology. We started with a simple mission: to make smart home technology accessible and user-friendly for everyone.
story.paragraph2: Today, we're proud to serve thousands of customers worldwide, helping them transform their homes into intelligent, connected spaces that enhance their daily lives and contribute to a more sustainable future.

team.title: Our Team
team.paragraph1: Our team consists of passionate engineers, designers, and customer service professionals who are dedicated to creating the best smart home experience possible. Each member brings unique expertise and creativity to our innovative solutions.
team.paragraph2: We combine technical expertise with a deep understanding of our customers' needs to deliver solutions that truly make a difference in how people live and interact with their homes.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.paragraph1: We believe that technology should make life easier, not more complicated. Our vision is to create a world where smart homes are accessible to everyone, enhancing comfort, security, and sustainability.
vision.paragraph2: Through continuous innovation and exceptional customer service, we strive to be the leading provider of smart home solutions globally.

smartAutomation.title: Smart Automation
smartAutomation.description: Control your entire home from anywhere with our intuitive app. Manage lighting, temperature, security, and more with a single tap.

advancedSecurity.title: Advanced Security
advancedSecurity.description: Keep your home safe with our state-of-the-art security system. Monitor your property in real-time and receive instant alerts.

energyEfficiency.title: Energy Efficiency
energyEfficiency.description: Save on energy costs with smart optimization. Our system learns your habits and adjusts settings for maximum efficiency.

deviceIntegration.title: Device Integration
deviceIntegration.description: Seamlessly connect and control all your smart devices from different manufacturers in one unified system.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Our expert team is available around the clock to help you with any questions or issues you might have.

smartAnalytics.title: Smart Analytics
smartAnalytics.description: Get detailed insights about your home's energy usage and security patterns with our advanced analytics.

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqSection.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about SmartHouse technology and services

whatIsSmartHome.question: What is a Smart Home?
whatIsSmartHome.answer: A smart home is an automation system that integrates various devices and systems in your home to create a comfortable, secure, and energy-efficient living environment. The system allows you to control lighting, heating, air conditioning, security, and other aspects of your home through a single interface.

howItWorks.question: How does a Smart Home system work?
howItWorks.answer:
The system operates based on the interaction of various components:

1. Sensors and detectors collect information about the state of your home
2. A central controller processes the data and makes decisions
3. Actuators (relays, motors, valves) execute commands
4. Users control the system through a mobile app or voice commands

All components are connected through wireless protocols (Wi-Fi, Zigbee, Z-Wave) or wiring.

benefits.question: What are the benefits of a Smart Home?

convenience.title: Convenience
convenience.description: Control all systems from one place

scalability.title: Scalability
scalability.description: Easy system expansion and device integration

internetRequired.question: Is constant internet connection required?
internetRequired.answer: For basic system operation, internet is not mandatory as core functions work locally. However, for remote control, notifications, and software updates, an internet connection is required.

howToStart.question: How to start using a Smart Home?
howToStart.answer:
To get started with the system, you need to:

1. Have a consultation with our experts
2. Determine required functions and devices
3. Install and configure the equipment
4. Receive training on system usage

Our specialists will assist at every stage and provide technical support.

customer1.name: John Smith
customer1.quote: SmartHouse has completely transformed how I interact with my home. The automation features are intuitive and the security system gives me peace of mind.

customer2.name: Sarah Johnson
customer2.quote: The energy savings I've experienced since installing SmartHouse are remarkable. The system is smart enough to learn my habits and optimize accordingly.

customer3.name: Michael Brown
customer3.quote: As someone who travels frequently, being able to monitor and control my smart home remotely is invaluable. The customer support is exceptional too.

tipsInfo.title: Feedback Tips
tipsInfo.description: To help us process your feedback as quickly and efficiently as possible, follow these tips:
tipsInfo.tip1: Be specific about the features or issues you're describing
tipsInfo.tip2: If possible, include the device name and software version
tipsInfo.tip3: Describe the expected result and the actual system behavior

help.title: Help
help.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions
help.notFound: Didn't find an answer to your question?
help.contactUs: Contact us through the feedback form, and we will respond as soon as possible.

general.a1: Smart Home is a system that allows you to automate and remotely control various processes in your home, such as lighting, heating, security, and more.
general.q2: How do I start using the system?
general.a2: Simply register, add your home, set up rooms and devices. The system is ready to use!
general.q3: Does the system work without internet?
general.a3: Some basic functions may work autonomously, but for full functionality and remote control, an internet connection is required.
general.q4: Does the system support voice assistants?
general.a4: Yes, SmartHouse fully integrates with popular voice assistants such as Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant, and Apple HomeKit/Siri. You can control your smart home using voice commands.

home.q1: How do I add a new home?
home.a1: Click the 'Add Home' button on the main page and fill in the required information about your home.
home.q2: How many homes can I add?
home.a2: You can add up to 5 homes in the basic plan.
home.q3: How do I delete a home?
home.a3: Go to home settings and click the 'Delete Home' button. Note that this action is irreversible.

devices.a1: We support a wide range of devices from different manufacturers, including smart lights, thermostats, cameras, motion sensors, and much more.
devices.q2: How do I connect a new device?
devices.a2: Go to the 'Devices' section, click 'Add Device', and select the type of device. Then follow the connection instructions.
devices.q3: What if a device won't connect?
devices.a3: Make sure the device is turned on and in pairing mode. Also check if you have a stable Wi-Fi connection.

account.q1: How do I change my password?
account.a1: Go to account settings and select the 'Change Password' option.
account.q2: How do I change my email?
account.a2: In account settings, select the 'Change Email' option and follow the instructions.
account.q3: How do I delete my account?
account.a3: In account settings, find the 'Delete Account' section. Note that this action is irreversible.
